clinical_study.brief_title: Registry of Pediatric Patients Diagnosed With Crohn's Disease in Belgium
clinical_study.official_title: Belgian Registry of Pediatric Crohn's Disease
clinical_study.source: Belgian Society for Pediatric Gastroentrology Hepatology and Nutrition

brief_summary.textblock: A registry of pediatric patients (under 18 yrs of age) diagnosed with Crohn's disease was created in Belgium. Over a 2 year period 257 patients are included. These patients will be follow up prospectively during 5 years. Demographic data, family history, disease presentation and disease course including medication are registered in CRF's.

primary_outcome.description: describe patient characteristics, disease fenotype and course

clinical_study.condition: Description of Disease Course, Disease Fenotype, Medication, Safety, Analysis for Possible Associations
